feat.value: You are troubled by those who are bound,
in the manner that they live on the herb of the field,
because they did not find what they shall eat,
and in the manner that we hear and those who see agree about their difficulty.
Hence, let us all pray, everyone who fears God, that Christ may put his blessing and that it may remain in his congregations and that he may not let his monasteries (lit. places) lack anything.
